name: Team Rocket’s Porygon-Z
author: Anesaki Dynamic
flavor_text: An additional program was installed to create a more advanced Pokémon, but it was apparently flawed. Porygon-Z moves oddly as a result.

abilities.name: Reconstitute
abilities.effect: You must discard 2 cards from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw a card.

attacks.name: R Command
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each Supporter card that has “Team Rocket” in its name in your discard pile.
